mfa.step2: 2、After installation and open GoogleAuthentication, select "Manual input key", input your account name and private key
mfa.step3: 3、After add success, you will receive a 6-digit with a certain time valid, input to specify field
mfa.secretKeyDesc: Please keep this private kay in a safety place, if private key is updated but not binded yet, please save and bind with the latest private key. If you lost mobile phone, this private key allow you to recover your identity authenticator, otherwise, you have to contact Customer Service to reset

invite.ruleContent: Activity rules: Every time the recommender successfully recommends a new user to vitatoken, he can receive a commission from the transaction fee when the new recommended user trades in any spot or fund. This means that you are free to invite users instantly through the referral link, and both offer commissions. Friends can also enjoy the transaction fee discount you set when registering using your referral link.
invite.inviteRate: The percentage of commission received by the inviter
invite.c1: If the inviter's net deposit is less than 5000 U, the rebate rate is 20%, and the inviter can set three levels of invitee rebate rate: 0%, 5%, and 10%.
invite.c2: If the inviter's net deposit is ≥5000 U, the rebate rate will be increased to 40%. The inviter can set the five-level inviter's cash back rate of 0%, 5%, 10%, 15%, and 20%.
invite.c3: If the inviter's net deposit is less than 5000 U, the rebate rate is 10%, and the inviter can set 0% and 5% for the two-file inviter's cash back rate.
invite.c4: If the inviter's net deposit is greater than or equal to 5000 U, the rebate rate will be increased to 20%. The inviter can set 0%, 5%, 10%, and three levels of the invitee's cash back rate.
invite.c5: 1. The data update time is based on UTC+0 time. The calculation of today's commission is based on the assets of the previous day, and the commission of the day is settled at 24:00:00 every day.
invite.c6: 2. Your referral commission will be credited to your asset V10 ETF within the next 72 hours. If you have not received your commission within the next 72 hours, please contact our Live Call Center for further assistance.
invite.c8: 1. If customers are found to be trading irregularly during the event, vitoken has the right to stop customer transactions and disqualify the reward
invite.c9: 2. The cost of ETF Redeem, bonus withdrawal process, the difference caused by bank charges or exchange rate shall be borne by the customer
invite.c10: 3. If you have any questions about the event, you can contact the online customer service at any time
invite.c11: 4. vitatoken reserves the right to modify, change or cancel this announcement for any reason at its sole discretion at any time without prior notice.
invite.c12: 5. Risk warning: There are risks in cryptocurrency transactions, please purchase with caution and pay attention to transaction risks. Please note that vitaken is not responsible for any guarantee, compensation, etc. for any of your transactions

assetsExplain.text1: Cash account value after all positions liquidated
assetsExplain.text2: Available and Open Position Total Margin Amount
assetsExplain.text3: Total open position occupied Total Margin Amount
assetsExplain.text5: ≤{lessThanVal}% Danger，loss amount is huge，trigger force liquidation
assetsExplain.text8: When the position is forced to close？
assetsExplain.text9: When margin level≤{lessThanVal}%，system will execute partially or full liquidation
assetsExplain.text11: 1. According to loss amount, will liquidate position with the largest loss amount
assetsExplain.text12: 2. If the loss amount are the same, liquidate position when earlier open position time
assetsExplain.text13: How to reduce force liquidation risk?
assetsExplain.text14: 1. Deposit and transfer funds to trading account to increase margin level
assetsExplain.text17: The estimated forced liquidation price which the system estimates the position will trigger a forced liquidation
assetsExplain.text18: Refers to the margin that has been occupied by the open position and cannot be used for new positions. The amount is calculated according to a certain percentage of the total contract value
assetsExplain.text19: The maintenance margin is the minimum amount that to maintain your position. If your position falls below the maintenance margin level, it will be automatically liquidated
assetsExplain.text21: Danger，loss amount is huge，trigger force liquidation
assetsExplain.text23: Safe：Position is relatively safe, keep monitoring
assetsExplain.text24: Occupied margin+real time Profit/Loss+overnight interest≤maintenance margin，force liquidate position
assetsExplain.text28: Reset demo account will liquidate all your positions and reset account balance to the initial amount
assetsExplain.text30: Funds that can be transferred from the Trading account to the external account
assetsExplain.text32: Refers to funds that can be transferred from or withdrawn from a trading account to other accounts.
assetsExplain.text33: What should be paid attention to when withdraw?
assetsExplain.text34: When there is a holding position and the status of [Margin Level] is dangerous, if you withdraw or transfer funds from the trading account at this time, it may cause forced liquidation due to insufficient funds.

footerInfo.RiskWarningContent: CFDs are complex financial products traded on margin. Trading CFDs is risky and may not be suitablefor all investors. Ensure you understand the risks involved as you may lose all your invested capital. Please consider our Privacy Policy, Risk And Warning Disclosure, and Trading Terms And Conditions, before using our services. CFD traders do not own or have any rights to the underlying assets.

bannerTopic.title: How to Seize Investment Opportunities by Paying Attention to Eurozone CPI
bannerTopic.content: On June 15th, the European Central Bank raised all three key interest rates in the Eurozone by 25 basis points, making it the eighth rate hike since July of last year. Despite slow economic growth, high inflation expectations make it difficult for the ECB to pause the rate hike. More rate increases may occur in July to combat inflation. The new rates will be effective from June 21st. The ECB aims to bring down inflation to 2% in the medium term. In May, the Eurozone's overall inflation rate was 6.1%, and the core inflation rate was higher than expected. The ECB revised its inflation expectations for 2023, while the Federal Reserve announced a pause in rate hikes. Investors should watch the Eurozone CPI YoY data on June 30th to assess future rate changes.
bannerTopic.content2: Grab the excellent winning opportunity in Headline.net!

headLineHome.topheadtext: Headline provides a full list of buy and sell orders pending execution, along with their sizes for all traders. It give traders the edge they need to succeed.
headLineHome.fairnessText: Ensuring that all market participants trade under the same set of rules, the matching engine seeks the best matches for all orders, ensuring fair competition.
headLineHome.transparencyText: All customer transactions are accurately reflected in the trading information, promoting transparency and building trust in the trading platform.
headLineHome.NOManipulationText: Signifying that exchanges or trading platforms do not intervene or manipulate market prices, ensuring that market prices are naturally formed based on supply and demand.
headLineHome.FraudulentText: Exchanges or trading platforms do not allow fraudulent trading activities (such as wash trades) to create false trading volumes. This helps maintain the authenticity and fairness of the market.
headLineHome.EffectiveText: Facilitating the discovery of market prices as buy and sell orders continuously match in the market, reflecting the market's perception of asset value.
headLineHome.TradeEasySub: Open an account and experience unparalleled safety with our sophisticated market depth data.
headLineHome.SupportedSub: Our platform empowers you with multi-currency deposits and withdrawals, enabling effortless transactions across networks.
headLineHome.ElevateSub: Start to trade in 3 easy steps to optimize your portfolio and maximize returns.
headLineHome.Step01Text: Open an account in one second
headLineHome.highlightSub: Focus on economic events to win big
headLineHome.SpreadText: Perfect for high-frequency traders and active investors . Headline offers zero spread, that enable traders to save on transaction costs.
headLineHome.ConfidentText: Free market depth access to ensure you get the most reliable market data.
headLineHome.LightingText: Headline provides order matching system that matches buy and sell orders on CFD market. It allows market traders to execute trades in milliseconds.
headLineHome.EconomicText: Focus on economic events to seizing the most valuable investment Opportunities
headLineHome.whytradeText03: Push notifications on increased volatility & market moves
headLineHome.awards-sub-title: Striving for excellence is at the core of everything we do, and as such, we channel all our efforts into delivering the best trading experience for our customers. We are deeply honored to have received multiple awards and recognition from reputable organizations in the industry. These accolades acknowledge our collective dedication and commitment to our customers.
headLineHome.achievements-item-2: Leading Innovator In MTF Trading Solutions 2024
headLineHome.achievements-item-3: Outstanding Platform For Equitable Financial Trading 2024
